Apteligent.name: Apteligent App
Apteligent.description: This was an open source app built using the Apteligent API.  It was built using React Native

Trip.name: Tripommendation App
Trip.description: This is an app that saves trip recommendations.

Sorting.name: Sorting Algorithms
Sorting.description: This is a simple program, written in Java, that I built to learn some of the fundamental sorting algorithms and to practise writing code in java.

Weather.name: Weather App
Weather.description: This very simple app was built for a Brown Bag showcasing React Native.  It was built to show how easy and how fast puttting together a native application is using React Native, and how smooth the reload and debugging tools are.
